page.title: 06PEOPLE'S JOBS
page.content: In our area most people are {farmers.}The next largest group are {office workers}such as secretary,computer operater,cashier and office manager.A few people work as{drivers}of vans and wagons.Some people work in{education}there are two teachers and one playgroup helper. Other jobs are{caretaker}and cook.Some people work in the village but most work in Harrogate,it is the nearest large place.Others travel to Knaresborough,Leeds and Bradford. {Most people get to work by car}because it is the quickest way.No one goes by bus because there is no bus service into Harrogate until 9.26 am and this is too late for work as people start between 8.am and 9.am and finish between 5.pm and 6.pm .Most people work Monday to Friday but some work at the weekend as well.
